name: International Research Awards on Oncology and Cancer Research
content: International Medical Awards on Oncology and Cancer Research is the Researchers and Research organizations around the world in the motive of Encouraging and Honouring them for their Significant contributions & Achievements for the Advancement in their field of Expertise. Researchers and scholars of all nationalities are eligible to receive Pencis medical awards. Nominees are judged on past accomplishments, research excellence and outstanding academic achievements.
